segment.source: Manage settings with an MDM provider (Surface Hub)
segment.target: Manage settings with an MDM provider (Surface Hub)

segment.source: Microsoft Surface Hub provides an enterprise management solution to help IT administrators manage policies and business applications on these devices using a mobile device management (MDM) solution.
segment.target: Microsoft Surface Hub provides an enterprise management solution to help IT administrators manage policies and business applications on these devices using a mobile device management (MDM) solution.

segment.source: Manage settings with an MDM provider (Surface Hub)
segment.target: Manage settings with an MDM provider (Surface Hub)

segment.source: Microsoft Surface Hub provides an enterprise management solution to help IT administrators manage policies and business applications on these devices using a mobile device management (MDM) solution.
segment.target: Microsoft Surface Hub provides an enterprise management solution to help IT administrators manage policies and business applications on these devices using a mobile device management (MDM) solution.

segment.source: The Surface Hub operating system has a built-in management component that's used to communicate with the device management server.
segment.target: The Surface Hub operating system has a built-in management component that's used to communicate with the device management server.

segment.source: There are two parts to the Surface Hub management component: the enrollment client, which enrolls and configures the device to communicate with the enterprise management server; and the management client, which periodically synchronizes with the management server to check for and apply updates.
segment.target: There are two parts to the Surface Hub management component: the enrollment client, which enrolls and configures the device to communicate with the enterprise management server; and the management client, which periodically synchronizes with the management server to check for and apply updates.

segment.source: Third-party MDM servers can manage Surface Hub devices by using the Mobile Device Management protocol.
segment.target: Third-party MDM servers can manage Surface Hub devices by using the Mobile Device Management protocol.

segment.source: Surface Hub management has been validated for the following MDM providers:
segment.target: Surface Hub management has been validated for the following MDM providers:

segment.source: Enroll a Surface Hub into MDM
segment.target: Enroll a Surface Hub into MDM

segment.source: If you joined your Surface Hub to an Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) subscription, the device can automatically enroll into MDM and will be ready for remote management.
segment.target: If you joined your Surface Hub to an Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) subscription, the device can automatically enroll into MDM and will be ready for remote management.

segment.source: Alternatively, the device can be enrolled like any other Windows device by going to SettingsAccountsWork access.
segment.target: Alternatively, the device can be enrolled like any other Windows device by going to SettingsAccountsWork access.

segment.source: image showing enroll in device maagement page.
segment.target: image showing enroll in device maagement page.

segment.source: The following table lists the device settings that can be managed remotely using MDM, including the OMA URI paths that 3rd party MDM providers need to create policies.
segment.target: The following table lists the device settings that can be managed remotely using MDM, including the OMA URI paths that 3rd party MDM providers need to create policies.

segment.source: Intune and SCCM have special templates to help create policies to manage these settings.
segment.target: Intune and SCCM have special templates to help create policies to manage these settings.

segment.source: Auto Awake when someone is in the room
segment.target: Auto Awake when someone is in the room

segment.source: Require that people must enter a PIN when pairing to the Surface Hub
segment.target: Require that people must enter a PIN when pairing to the Surface Hub

segment.source: As an example, to set a 3 hour duration, you set the value to 180.
segment.target: As an example, to set a 3 hour duration, you set the value to 180.

segment.source: Set the maintenance window start time.
segment.target: Set the maintenance window start time.

segment.source: This time is in minutes past midnight.
segment.target: This time is in minutes past midnight.

segment.source: To set a 2:00 am start time, set a value of 120, meaning 120 minutes past midnight.
segment.target: To set a 2:00 am start time, set a value of 120, meaning 120 minutes past midnight.

segment.source: The Microsoft Operations Management Suite (OMS) Workspace ID that this device will connect to.
segment.target: The Microsoft Operations Management Suite (OMS) Workspace ID that this device will connect to.

segment.source: The key that must be used when connecting to the specified OMS workspace.
segment.target: The key that must be used when connecting to the specified OMS workspace.

segment.source: Choose the meeting information displayed on the welcome screen.
segment.target: Choose the meeting information displayed on the welcome screen.

segment.source: Value : 0 - Show organizer and time only
segment.target: Value : 0 - Show organizer and time only

segment.source: Value : 1 - Show organizer, time, and subject (subject is hidden for private meetings)
segment.target: Value : 1 - Show organizer, time, and subject (subject is hidden for private meetings)

segment.source: Enable/Disable all Wireless Projection to the Surface Hub
segment.target: Enable/Disable all Wireless Projection to the Surface Hub

segment.source: Select a specific wireless channel on which Miracast Receive will operate
segment.target: Select a specific wireless channel on which Miracast Receive will operate

segment.source: Change the background image for the welcome screen using a PNG image URL.
segment.target: Change the background image for the welcome screen using a PNG image URL.
